properties.name: app.jwt.key
properties.description: The secret used to sign the JWT token'

properties.name: app.jwt.algorithm
properties.description: The algorithm used to sign the JWT token

properties.name: app.jwt.issuer
properties.description: The issuer of the JWT token

properties.name: app.jwt.expires-in
properties.description: The expiration time of the JWT token

properties.name: app.rabbit.exchange.product
properties.description: The exchange used to send product messages

properties.name: app.rabbit.routingKey.product-stock
properties.description: The routing key used to send product stock messages

properties.name: app.rabbit.routingKey.sales-confirmation
properties.description: The routing key used to send sales confirmation messages

properties.name: app.rabbit.queue.product-stock
properties.description: The queue used to receive product stock messages

properties.name: app.rabbit.queue.sales-confirmation
properties.description: The queue used to receive sales confirmation messages
